document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cannot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">soul, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">saw </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">house, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">furniture </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">has </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">invited </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">dwell; </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">confiding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">guest, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">consult </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">well, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">raiment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">honor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">most, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">adequately </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">dressed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">insures </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">none </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Lest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">specifical </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">adorn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Procuring </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">perpetual </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">drest </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">dating </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">sudden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">feast. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I cannot see my soul but know 'tis there
